methodology.plv: Phase-Locking Value quantifies phase concentration (0=random, 1=perfect alignment)
methodology.rayleigh_test: Tests if phases are uniformly distributed (small p = non-uniform)
methodology.v_test: Tests if phases cluster around a specific direction (0 radians)

recommendations.primary_metric: Use PLV as primary phase coherence metric
recommendations.significance_testing: Report Rayleigh p-values for each distance bin
recommendations.snr_consideration: Compare weighted vs unweighted to assess SNR effects
recommendations.robustness: Bootstrap confidence intervals on PLV values

comparison_with_current.similarity: cos(mean_angle) ≈ current metric when phases are concentrated
comparison_with_current.advantage: Circular statistics provide proper uncertainty quantification
